body.p: Kentucky soldier. Married to Perlina McIntosh Wilson in Breathitt County, Kentucky in 1850. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Sergeant from September 22 1861 to March 29, 1862. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 2nd Lieutenant from March 29, 1862 to July 21,1862. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 1st Lieutenant from July 21, 1862 to March 1, 1863. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Captain from March 1, 1863 to May 16, 1863. Killed in action at the Battle of Champion Hill in Baker Creek, Mississippi on May 16,1863.
